Spells:
Acid Splash (S0 Conj): R60' Ranged touch inflicts 4d6 HP acid (Dex neg)
Cloud Of Daggers (S2 Conj): R60' 5' cu inflicts 4d4 HP slashing for conc or 1 min [+Level inflicts +2d4 HP]
Color Spray (S1 Illu): 15' cone blinds 6d10 HP of targets for 1 rd [+Level affects +2d10 HP of targets]
Cone Of Cold (S5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Con half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (S4 Ench): R90' Creatures in 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack adjacent/20% act normally (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level increases radius +5']
Crown Of Madness (S2 Ench): R120' Self directs target's attacks (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Disguise Self (B1 Illu): Self clothing and body appear different for 1 hr
Disintegrate (S6 Tran): R60' Target suffers 10d6+40 HP force, dusts if reduced to 0 HP (Dex neg) [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Dominate Beast (S4 Ench): R60' Target obeys self telepathic commands (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level extends duration to 10 min/1 hr/8 hr at level 5/6/7]
Fear (S3 Illu): Creatures in 30' cone flee (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Feather Fall (S1 Tran): R60' 5 falling targets slow to 60'/rd for 1 min
Fireball (S3 Evoc): R150' 20' radius inflicts 8d6 HP fire (Dex half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Friends (B0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Cha checks w/target for conc or 1 min
Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Cha checks w/target for conc or 1 min
Incendiary Cloud (S8 Conj): R150' 20' radius inflicts 10d8 HP fire (Dex half), moves away 10'/rd for conc or 1 min
Lightning Bolt (S3 Evoc): 100'x5' line inflicts 8d6 HP lightning (Dex half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Mage Armor (S1 Abju): Touched gains AC 13 + DexMod in no armor for 8 hr
Mage Hand (S0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks moving up to 10 lb for 1 min
Mending (S0 Tran): Touch repairs small tear
Message (S0 Tran): R120' Self and target have whispered conversation for 1 rd
Meteor Swarm (S9 Evoc): R1 mile 40' radius inflicts 20d6 HP fire and 20d6 HP bludgeoning (Dex half)
Minor Illusion (S0 Illu): R30' Creates sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min
Move Earth (S6 Tran): R120' Reshapes 40' cu of earth for conc or 2 hr
Poison Spray (S0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Con neg)
Polymorph (S4 Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wis neg) for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Ray Of Frost (S0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Ray Of Sickness (S1 Necr): R60' Target suffers 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Con not poisoned) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Reverse Gravity (S7 Tran): R50' Items in 50' radius fall upward for conc or 1 min
Seeming (S5 Illu): R30' Changes appearance of targets (Cha neg) for 8 hr
Shatter (S2 Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (Con half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Telekinesis (S5 Tran): R60' Moves 1000 lb 30'/rd (Str neg) for conc or 10 min
Teleport (S7 Conj): R10' Object or self and 8 allies teleport any distance
True Strike (B0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd
Witch Bolt (S1 Evoc): R30' Ranged spell inflicts 1d12 HP lightning/rd for conc or 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d12 HP initial]
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Bard): Know 2 B0 spells, cast 1 B1 spell/long rest
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Know 2 S0 spells, cast 1 S1 spell/long rest
Arcane Exemplar Form: Discharge 6 runes for 40' Fly, +2 spell DC, resistance to spell damage, and regain HP from casting for 3 rd
Careful Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to protect 4 creature(s) from self spell
Essence Runes: Spending Sorcery Points charges 20 runes; 5 charged runes emit 5' light
Flexible Casting: Convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Font Of Magic: Use 20 Sorcery Points/long rest
Glyphs Of Aegis: Discharge runes to negate 1d6 damage each, touch can transfer 1 rune for 1 hr
Manifest Inscriptions: R15' Discharge 1 rune to reveal hidden glyphs
Quickened Spell: Spend 2 Sorcery Points to cast spell as bonus action
Runic Torrent: Discharge spell level runes to overcome target resistance and immunity
Sigilic Augmentation: Discharge rune for Adv on Str, Dex, or Con checks for 1 rd
Sorcerous Restoration: Regain 4 Sorcery Points/short rest
Subtle Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast w/out somatic or verbal components
Twinned Spell: Spend spell level Sorcery Points to add second target
